paper_abstract: Let Z subset of P-r be a smooth variety of dimension n and let c(0) (,...,) c(n) be the Chern classes of Z. We present an algorithm to compute the degree of any monomial in {c(0) (,...,) c(n)}. The method is based on intersection theory and may be implemented as a numeric or as a symbolic algorithm. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Computing intersection numbers of Chern classes
